scenario_text.value: Peep pyu... Peep, peep!
Only, now you can’t talk...
I have no clue what you’re saying.
Peep, pyu...

Oh, but that doesn’t bother me! You’ve got
your own kind of charm.
Pyu...?
You’re...kinda cute! No, really cute!
Peep, peep!

Heheheh, I’m glad you seem happy about that!
Let’s stay together forever, uh...Mermaimon?
Hmm... I wonder what your name is now...
Pyu, pyu! Peeeep!

Miu! You all right?! I heard there was some
mad-looking bad guy around here!
Hey... Wh-where did it go...?

Oh, Kaito... You’re too late! The fight’s
been done for like a million years!

No way... Did you seriously take care of that
thing on your own?

Yeah, with a little help from my friend!
Right, Takuma?
Yeah... The two of them were incredible.
Huh, ’zat right...
Peep, peep!

Huh? Whuzzat? You got something you wanna say
to Miu, here?
To me? What is it?!
Peep, pyu...!
“Call me MarineAngemon.”
MarineAngemon... That’s your name?
Peep, peep!
Ha ha, look how happy she is.
You two got that kinda bond, huh? I get it...
You seriously took down that guy together.
Like I didn’t JUST say that to you!
Yeah... Guess you’ve grown, huh, Miu...

Eheheh... You bet I have! I’m not going to be
a kid forever!
